QuestData.Title: Stick It To 'Em!
QuestData.Description:
We have been able to stop the Grand Rite but the witches will try again unless we act.
We have to destroy them. Utterly.
<Cleardawn smiles.>
How kind of them to give us the means.
You've helped us get this far, $n. You control the Demolisher. Destroy everything you see!
Once we've finished we can signal for help out of here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Crimsonwood Demolisher to destroy witch forces in the Crimson Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Inquisitor Cleardawn in Arom's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: The plans for the Grand Rite are ruined and their rutial sites are in shambles. Master Ashton will be safe here in Arom's stand and we can finally send reinforcements to Falconhurst by gryphon.$b$bIn all, a job well done! Thank you for your vital help.
